author: slaws
msg: Removing as it's not being used. Looking to build extension aggregated by referring directly to "runtime" modules.

author: markt
msg: Ensure Vary header is set if response may be compressed rather than only setting it if it is compressed.

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3674 - Add in a new mojo for generating meta data about groups of bundles, i.e. Tuscany extensions. This is basically a copy of ModuleBundlesBuildMojo.java but massaged to generate ant filesets, manifest etc. for a specified set of dependencies rather than for artefacts with the string "feature" in the name. It also doesn't do the copying of jars into /modules. There is therefore a lot of complexity in here that's not required. Needs rationalising if we decide we like the output.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3170: Fixed problem setting password from userinfo in uri with the ftp endpoint.
